modName: Skyrim Post Helgen Save File - SPHSF
summary: A complete save game after Helgen so you can start the game immediately without having to go through the lengthy start scene
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00][b][size=4]Description[/size]

[/b][/color][size=3]A complete save game after Helgen so you can start the game immediately without having to go through the lengthy start scene. The save starts after you exit the cave. Every single chest, corpses, skeletons, you name it, has been looted so after you exit the cave, you will have everything you need to start any class you choose.[/size][size=3] The save file has also been cleaned of HAVOK Traces and removed of invalid scripts by Save Game Script Cleaner.

[color=#ffff00][size=4][b]Save[/b][/size][/color] [color=#ffff00][b]Information[/b][/color]

[color=#00ffff][i]To customize your character and or race, open the console and type '[b]showracemenu[/b]' [/i][/color]
[/size]
[size=3]Since everything was looted, you will need to drop some items to prevent being overencumbered

-----

[i]All can be changed to your liking[/i]

[b]Name[/b]: Hotdog Jesus
[b]Level[/b]: 1, able to move on to 2, perk point has not been spent
[b]Race[/b]: Default Look/Style Argonian
[b]Helgen Exit[/b]: Sided with Stormcloak[/size]

[b][color=#ffff00][size=4]Requirements[/size][/color][/b]

[size=3]- Skyrim [b]Legendary Edition[/b] 1.9.32 ([b][color=#00ff00]LATEST[/color][/b])[/size][size=3]
- SKSE

[i][size=2]...without these DLCs, you will get a CTD for missing masters[/size][/i]
[/size]
[color=#ffff00][size=4][b]Compatibility[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]You will need to do extra steps when configuring some mods. For example, Imperious Races of Skyrim needs to be tweaked since this save game I created is an Argonian, and you might not want to play an Argonian. There is a section in the MCM that gives races their correct abilities, be sure to look at that.[/size]
[size=3]
Be sure to configure your mods before playing the game to further avoid any issues.[/size]
[size=4]
[b][color=#ffff00]Installation[/color][/b][/size]

[size=3]1. Move the downloaded files to "\Documents\My Games\Skyrim\Saves"[/size]
[size=3]2. Load up the save in Skyrim[/size]
3. Done!

[b][color=#ffff00][size=4]Uninstallation[/size][/color][/b]

[size=3]Delete the save game from the folder or delete it through Skyrim.[/size][size=3]
[/size]
author: 123keelos

files.name: Skyrim Post Helgen Save File - SPHSF
